title: Get Your First Look At Victoria Beckham’s Brand New Make-Up Collection
text:
From ELLE

Update 14/9/19:

It’s here. The most anticipated make-up line of the year has landed, yes, we’re talking about Victoria Beckham Beauty. After giving us a sneak peek earlier in the week, Beckham’s debut make-up collection has finally dropped. And you won’t be disappointed.

Kicking off the clean beauty brand is Victoria’s Smoky Eye Wardrobe. Having firmly established her signature brown smoky eye over the past decade, it’s unsurprising that the make-up mogul’s first move was to drop a capsule collection of serious eye make-up. In fact, Beckham’s seemingly been working on the first products from her eponymous brand for years now, saying, ‘Eyes are very signature for me. The products may be new, but they’ve been a lifetime in the making.’

What’s in Victoria’s personal smoky eye wardrobe we hear you ask? Three failsafe eye products that Beckham herself keeps in her make-up bag.

Photo credit: Victoria Beckham More

First up is a satisfyingly sleek (and totally plastic-free) Smoky Eye Brick (£48) eyeshadow compact in four iterations that nod to the designer’s fashion prowess: Signature (VB’s favourite shades for a day time contoured eye look), Tuxedo (your vegan-friendly kit for the ultimate smoky eye), Tweed (warm autumnal shades of terracotta and deep plum) and Royal (vegan hues of navy blue).

Four pearlescent cream Lid Lustre (£28) eyeshadows inspired by the healing and protective power of crystals that Victoria always surrounds herself with, and three shades of Satin Kajal Liner (£20), including what might just be the best kohl pencil we’ve ever come across, complete the collection.











The best bit? Victoria Beckham Beauty is on a mission to set higher standards in beauty by using minimal plastic, 100% post-consumer waste secondary packaging and shipping materials that are recyclable or biodegradable. Even the pouch your order is delivered in is reusable. So now you can nab the entire collection and do the planet a favour as well.

Update 11/9/19:

Having teased us with behind-the-scenes footage of her upcoming beauty line back in July, Victoria Beckham has finally confirmed the launch date of the most anticipated make-up drop of the year.

The designer took to her new Victoria Beckham Beauty Instagram account to reveal the launch date, posting a boomerang of what we can only assume is the make-up mogul's own eye alongside the caption:

'The final countdown starts NOW - #VictoriaBeckhamBeauty launches in just four days. Stay tuned for more news about the debut collection. Beauty that moves you. Link in bio. #CleanBeauty

From the smokey bronzed eyeshadow, fluttery lashes and straight pencilled eyebrows, we're guessing the new line will include everything you need to recreate the Brit's signature beauty look.

Beckham also posted an image of the make-up line's logo that links through to her new website where a countdown to launch awaits eager fans. Currently on just over three days, we can surmise that the Victoria Beckham Beauty line is going to drop on Saturday 14th September, slap bang in the middle of London Fashion Week.

Watch this space for more details as they drop.



Update 9/7/2019:

Victoria Beckham has revealed a sneak peek from behind the scenes on set where the designer was shooting content for her upcoming beauty line, Victoria Beckham Beauty.
